required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: the Effect of Prenatal Vitamins on the Tooth Structure
clinical_study.official_title: the Effect of Prenatal Vitamins on the Children Teeth: Elementary Analysis

brief_summary.textblock: the effect of mother prenatal care on the teeth of the newborn children, if it affect the tooth structure or not

detailed_description.textblock: teeth lost due to normal shedding will be collected,it will be classified into mother that take pregnancy vitamins and mother that doesn't take pregnancy vitamins, the female will be from the same population and from the same city to make sure that the environmental condition are almost the same .teeth will be subjected to elementary analysis to determine the different ratio of different component and if there is any change between the two group

primary_outcome.measure: the different teeth minerals and component
primary_outcome.description: analysis of exofilated teeth mineral ratio

secondary_outcome.description: dmf index for every patient to count the total missed and decayed teeth

arm_group.description: teeth of children of non vitamin taking mother
children teeth of vitamin taking mother

study_pop.textblock: healthy children within the normal period of teeth shedding

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria teeth lost due to normal shedding sound teeth with non hereditary conditions normal children mother that don not suffer from chronic illness ex: diabetes
Exclusion Criteria:
- teeth extracted due to caries or trauma teeth with hereditary anomalies ex: hypoplasia
